scripts.electron:dev: concurrently -k -s first "vite build --watch --emptyOutDir" "wait-on -v file:dist/index.html && cross-env ELECTRON_DIST_WATCH=1 electron ."
scripts.electron:dev:debug: concurrently -k -s first "vite build --watch --emptyOutDir" "wait-on -v file:dist/index.html && cross-env ELECTRON_DIST_WATCH=1 OPEN_DEVTOOLS=1 electron ."
scripts.electron:dev:server: concurrently -k -s first "vite --strictPort" "wait-on -v http-get://localhost:5173/index.html http-get://localhost:5173/src/main.jsx && cross-env ELECTRON_START_URL=http://localhost:5173 OPEN_DEVTOOLS=1 electron ."
scripts.dist: npm run clean && npm run build:helper && npm run build && electron-builder --publish never
scripts.pack: npm run clean && npm run build:helper && npm run build && electron-builder --win nsis,zip
scripts.pack:dir: npm run clean && npm run build:helper && npm run build && electron-builder --dir
scripts.pack:linux: npm run clean && npm run build && electron-builder --linux AppImage
scripts.pack:mac: npm run clean && npm run build && electron-builder --mac dmg zip
scripts.push-release: node -e "const v=require('./package.json').version; const {execSync}=require('child_process'); execSync('git push origin HEAD',{stdio:'inherit'}); execSync('git push origin v'+v,{stdio:'inherit'});"
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch -m "v%s" && npm run push-release
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor -m "v%s" && npm run push-release
scripts.release:major: npm version major -m "v%s" && npm run push-release
scripts.publish: npm run clean && npm run build:helper && npm run build && electron-builder --publish always
